title: How to Send a Goodnight Text

steps.title: A short text keeps your message simple and straightforward.
steps.content: A short text keeps your message simple and straightforward. This message sounds cute without going overboard whether you’re chatting with your crush or your S.O. [1] X Research source

steps.title: They’ll feel so important that you thought of them before bed.
steps.content: They’ll feel so important that you thought of them before bed. You can try this text with a crush if you want to sound flirty or to be really romantic with a long-term partner.

steps.title: Send this text if you went on a date or hung out earlier.
steps.content: Send this text if you went on a date or hung out earlier. They will feel really special hearing that they were the best part of your day. This text will help cement the memory of the date and is a great way to finish the day.

steps.title: This text shows that nothing else matters before bed except them.
steps.content: This text shows that nothing else matters before bed except them. Whether you’re talking to your partner or a new crush, it’ll sound so sweet that you’ve thought of them.

steps.title: End the night with a sweet compliment.
steps.content: End the night with a sweet compliment. Make that special person in your life blush by saying what you love about them.

steps.title: This text sounds so cute no matter who you send it to.
steps.content: This text sounds so cute no matter who you send it to. You might not be there to give them a real kiss, but the person you’re texting will wish you were.

steps.title: A quick loving text before bed is perfect for your partner.
steps.content: A quick loving text before bed is perfect for your partner. Even if you just pop in with a short message, your S.O. will know that you care a lot about them. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tell whoever you’re texting how much you love talking to them.
steps.content: Tell whoever you’re texting how much you love talking to them. Sleep will seem like the last thing you want to do because you’re having so much fun with your convo.

steps.title: Give them something to look forward to when they wake up.
steps.content: Give them something to look forward to when they wake up. If you know you’re getting together with your crush or partner, build up the anticipation to get them really excited.

steps.title: Make it sound like waiting any amount of time is too long.
steps.content: Make it sound like waiting any amount of time is too long. You’ll sound so eager to see your crush that they’ll want to get together as soon as possible. You can also try hinting at something fun or interesting to do for the next date, so they have something to look forward to!

steps.title: This cute message shows that they’re the only one you want to fall asleep with.
steps.content: This cute message shows that they’re the only one you want to fall asleep with. Your crush or S.O. will imagine what it’s like to be all cozy with you in bed.

steps.title: Your crush or partner will want to cuddle up with you immediately.
steps.content: Your crush or partner will want to cuddle up with you immediately. While it will make them miss you like crazy, it could also get them to actually come over if you want to be together.

steps.title: Try this flirty text to say you’re thinking of them even when you’re asleep.
steps.content: Try this flirty text to say you’re thinking of them even when you’re asleep. If you’re lucky, maybe you’ll even show up in their dreams too!

steps.title: Flatter your crush or S.O. by saying they’re the perfect one for you.
steps.content: Flatter your crush or S.O. by saying they’re the perfect one for you. This text may sound a little jokey, but they’ll think it’s really sincere.

steps.title: This is a sneaky way to learn about your crush and the music they like.
steps.content: This is a sneaky way to learn about your crush and the music they like. Your crush will love that the last thing you’ll hear before going to bed is something they sent you. [3] X Research source

steps.title: They’ll love knowing that you’re waiting by your phone for them.
steps.content: They’ll love knowing that you’re waiting by your phone for them. It shows that you care so much about them that you’d lose sleep just to talk to them.

steps.title: This text lets him know that you want him to spend the night.
steps.content: This text lets him know that you want him to spend the night. Your crush or partner will love that you want to start your day by seeing them.

steps.title: Your crush or S.O. will love that you think they’re stunning like the night sky.
steps.content: Your crush or S.O. will love that you think they’re stunning like the night sky. Let them know how bright they shine in your life and they’re sure to think of you all night long.

steps.title: Try this poetic message to say that you’ll miss them through the night.
steps.content: Try this poetic message to say that you’ll miss them through the night. It’ll sound a little quirky, but your crush or partner will think it’s romantic.

steps.title: Tease your crush a little so you stick in their mind all night.
steps.content: Tease your crush a little so you stick in their mind all night. If they weren’t already missing you, they’ll surely be excited to chat when you wake up.

steps.title: This classic line ends your night on a goofy note.
steps.content: This classic line ends your night on a goofy note. Even though it sounds a little corny, it’s bound to put a smile on your crush’s face. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Even if they weren’t thinking of you all day, they will be now.
steps.content: Even if they weren’t thinking of you all day, they will be now. Your crush or partner will also get a good laugh from this cute and jokey message.

steps.title: This text tells them that you’re looking forward to tomorrow’s conversation.
steps.content: This text tells them that you’re looking forward to tomorrow’s conversation. The cute nickname at the end is the icing on the cake that will make the person you’re texting smile.

steps.title: Give them a heads up before you fall asleep and stop texting them.
steps.content: Give them a heads up before you fall asleep and stop texting them. If you’re so tired that you could doze off at any second, this text tells your crush or S.O. that you’ll be back in the morning.

steps.title: Your crush or partner won’t worry about why you haven’t replied.
steps.content: Your crush or partner won’t worry about why you haven’t replied. When you’re texting late at night, this is a good lighthearted message in case you fall asleep on them.
